title: Strengthening Business Practice Competencies: Experiential Simulations for Informal Science Education and Communication

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain scientific principles of agriculture and resource management by 80% or more in a VR-based simulation environment.
Learners can present three or more communication strategies to effectively convey scientific information to non-majors through experiential exhibition design.
Learners can analyze perceptual differences among learners from diverse backgrounds through project deliverables and propose science communication plans reflecting these insights.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
